src:
5 Kafe Ini Bisa Jadi Spot Foto Prewedding Kece di Jakarta
02 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Foto: instagram

Jakarta - Bingung mau foto prewedding di mana? Manfaatkan saja kafe kekinian yang kece dan bisa jadi spot prewedding sambil makan enak.Beberapa kafe di Jakarta bukan hanya menawarkan makanan enak saja tapi konsepnya juga kece dan kekinian. Bagi pasangan calon pengantin yang bingung menentukan spot foto prewedding, kafe-kafe instagenik ini bisa dimanfaatkan.Bisa berfoto sambil makan juga lho. Berikut beberapa tempat makan yang kece dan bisa dijadikan spot foto prewedding.1. Bukanagara Coffee


Foto: instagram

Coffee shop yang satu ini bisa juga jadi latar foto romantis Anda dan pasangan. Kafe semi outdoor yang ada di pusat kota ini menawarkan suasana yang nyaman lengkap dengan dekorasi yang ciamik.Anda bisa berfoto santai sambil menikmati kopi dan makanan. Selain itu, foto prewedding di sini juga bisa menekan budget lho. Anda tak perlu mengeluarkan biaya ekstra untuk sewa foto studio. Setelah berfoto, jangan lupa cicip aneka makanan enak di sini.Bukanagara CoffeeGraha CIMB NiagaJl. Jenderal SudirmanSenayan, JakartaTelepon 0859733008882. Caffeine Suite


Foto: instagram

Kafe yang satu ini bisa jadi tempat melepas penat, memanjakan lidah sekaligus bisa jadi lokasi foto prewedding kece. Kafe mungil ini juga dilengkapi sebuah kolam kecil yang siap jadi background foto.Selain bisa jadi tempat berburu foto instagenik, makanan dan minuman di sini juga bervarian.Pencinta kopi bisa memilih ragam kopi nikmat racikan para barista.Caffeine SuiteJl. Duri Mas Rata I No. 38 Duri KepaKebon JerukJakarta BaratTelepon : 081188880513. Cork & Screw


Foto: instagram

Restoran yang ada di pusat Jakarta ini menawarkan sensasi tenang dan asri. Makan dan minum di resto ini serasa sedang liburan di Bali. Suasana ini juga bisa diandalkan sebagai background foto prewedding.Usai berfoto jangan lupa cicipi berbagai makanan dan minuman enak racikan para chef ternama. Makanan cita rasa Indonesia dan western bisa jadi pilihan.Cork & ScrewSenayan National Golf ClubThe Maj SenayanJl. Asia Afrika Pintu IX, JakartaTelepon (021) 57063654. Mil and Bay


Foto: instagram

Galeri sekaligus kafe mungil ini cocok jadi tempat berfoto prewedding untuk tema rustic. Dekorasi dengan sentuhan alami menjadi poin utama kafe ini.Kursi kayu, rotan hingga hiasan dinding dari jerami bisa diandalkan untuk foto. Meskipun mungil tapi kafe ini selalu ramai disambangi pengunjung. Kalau mau berfoto prewedding di sini sebaiknya melakukan janji dulu agar suasana kafe agak kondusif.Mil and BayJl.Mandor Hasan No 79, CipayungJakarta TimurTelepon : 0819317526905. Arjuna Jakarta


Foto: instagram

Restoran bernuansa jawa klasik ini juga sekaligus membuka studio foto yang bisa disewakan. Para calon pengantin bahkan bisa berpose dengan kostum khas Jawa yang juga disewakan di sini.Soal makanan dan minuman, resto ini menghadirkan beragam menu utama berbahan ayam, ikan dan daging sapi. Anda bisa menjajal kelezatan ayam goreng arjuna yang kabarnya punya rasa juara. Untuk berfoto di sini ada tarif yang dikenakan layaknya sewa studio foto.Arjuna Resto dan StudioJl. Wijaya Timur 1 No. 6Dharmawangsa, JakartaTelepon (021) 29236163 Simak Video "Uniknya Foto Prewedding Ala Pasangan Foodies Ini"[Gambas:Video 20detik](dvs/odi)
text:
5 These Cafes Can Be Spot Photos of Prewedding Kece in Jakarta
02 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Photo: Instagram

Jakarta - Confused where do you want to prewedding photos? Just take advantage of the modern cafe that is cool and can be a prewedding spot while eating delicious food. Some cafes in Jakarta not only offer tasty food but the concept is also cool and up to date. For the bride and groom couples who are confused about determining prewedding photo spots, these instagenic cafes can be used. You can take pictures while you eat too. Here are some cool places to eat and can be used as photo spots prewedding. Bukanagara Coffee


Photo: Instagram

This coffee shop can also be a romantic photo background for you and your partner. Semi-outdoor cafe in the city center offers a comfortable atmosphere complete with good decoration. You can take pictures relaxing while enjoying coffee and food. In addition, photo prewedding here can also reduce the budget, you know. You do not need to pay extra to rent a photo studio. After taking a photo, don't forget to taste the tasty food here. Not Coffee Coffee Graha CIMB NiagaJl. Jenderal Sudirman Senen, Jakarta Phone 0859733008882. Caffeine Suite


Photo: Instagram

This cafe can be a place to unwind, indulge the tongue as well as being the location of a small prewedding photo. This little cafe is also equipped with a small pool that is ready to be a background photo. In addition to being a place to hunt for instagenic photos, food and drinks here are also varied. Coffee lovers can choose a variety of delicious coffee concocted by the barista. Caffeine SuiteJl. Duri Mas Rata I No. 38 Duri KepaKebon JerukJakarta Barat Phone: 081188880513. Cork & Screw


Photo: Instagram

This restaurant in the center of Jakarta offers a sensation of calm and beauty. Eating and drinking at this restaurant seemed to be on vacation in Bali. This atmosphere can also be relied upon as a background photo prewedding. After taking a picture, don't forget to taste a variety of delicious food and drinks made by famous chefs. Indonesian and western food can be a choice .ork & Screw Senayan National Golf ClubThe Maj SenayanJl. Asia Afrika Pintu IX, Jakarta Phone (021) 57063654. Mil and Bay


Photo: Instagram

This small gallery and caf√© is a suitable place for taking prewedding for rustic themes. Decoration with a natural touch is the main point of this cafe. Wooden chairs, rattan to straw wall hangings can be relied on for photos. Although small, but this cafe is always crowded with visitors. If you want to take a photo prewedding here you should make an appointment first so that the atmosphere of the cafe is rather conducive. Mil and BayJl. Hasan Hasan No 79, Cipayung East Jakarta Phone: 0819317526905


Photo: Instagram

This classic Javanese restaurant also opens a photo studio that can be rented. The bride and groom can even pose with typical Javanese costumes that are also rented here. Regarding food and drink, this restaurant presents a variety of main menus made from chicken, fish and beef. You can try the delicacy of Arjuna fried chicken that reportedly has a sense of champion. To take a picture here there are rates charged like rental studio photography. Arjuna Resto and StudioJl. Wijaya Timur 1 No. 6Dharmawangsa, JakartaPhone (021) 29236163 See Video "The Unique Photos of Prewedding Ala These Foodies" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (dvs / odi)
